11112.content:
Alvin sighed heavily and lowered his head sadly, knowing that if he'd managed to wet his bed once more it was time to inform Dave. He'd already told their adoptive father that he'd been wetting the bed, and had been relieved when Dave told him it was something that happened to human children too every once and a while. The only thing Dave had seemed to be concerned about, what that Alvin seemed to be wetting every single time he fell asleep, every night, and anytime he slept during the day as well.

Climbing out of his bed, Alvin was thankful that Simon was already down in his lab, and that Theodore hadn't decided to sleep in. He'd managed to keep his wetting from his brother's for the moment, and he wanted to keep things that way for as long as possible. Heading down the hallway his clawed toes clicked against the ground but he barely notice, his wet onesie clinging to his fur and making him shiver from the cold feeling.

Leaning around the corner he softly called out, "D-Dave...um..can you come upstairs please."

A second later he heard the sound of footsteps, and Theodore's voice asking Dave if he should come too. Dave quickly dissuaded Theodore and Alvin managed to breath a sigh of relief, a few seconds later his Father had climbed up the stairs and stopped in front of him, looking down at him in concern. Alvin felt his cheeks heat a little and was thankful for his fur that was hiding the blush at Dave seeing him in his wet onesie, after a second he opened his mouth to say something, but trailed off as Dave started talking to him softly.

"Oh Alvin," sighed Dave, kneeling down and putting his hands on his son's shoulders, "It happened again hey bud, come on, let's go get you washed up and discuss what we should do about it."

Alvin just nodded...

123.content:
Starring down at the envelope in his small furry paws, young Simon Seville felt a large among of red-hot anger coursing through him, and if he hadn’t been holding the envelope his paws would have been clenched in rage. He couldn’t believe that Alvin would do this too him, blackmailing him for something that he’d found out by complete accident, and sworn to keep secret!

Wait…

Simon frowned in annoyance, what was he thinking? Of course Alvin would do something mean like this, his brother was always pushing him and trying to test how much it took for him to get angry…and normally it didn’t even bother him. Simon was proud of his calm demeanour and desire to not fight with his brother, but this time…this…it was too much.

Simon,

It’s not fair that I have to keep your secret and get nothing in return, wear this and then go experiment in your lab well waiting for me. If you don’t wear it and go to your lab, or go to your lab just not wearing it, I’ll know.

I’ll tell everyone your secret!

With trembling paws Simon put the envelope and note down on his bed, eyes slowly trailing over to the offending object sitting innocently on his blue covers where it’d fallen out earlier. A white folded plastic square sat innocently, and the sight of it only made Simon angrier, and more embarrassed. What was he supposed to do?

Did he give in to his brother and wear it…
Or fight and hope his brother was only bluffing about telling?

But Alvin rarely bluffed when he wanted something…Simon sighed and moved over, reaching out and taking the plastic square into his paws, a loud crinkling seemingly echoing through the entire room. Unfolding it, the young munk stared at the diaper, breathing in and trying to decided what to do.
123.title: Pictures aren't worth the thousand words...

132112112.content: Theodore I have surprise for you come sit on my lap Eleanor said to him and then Theodore said OK so when Theodore was sat on her lap She undid her shirt and bra And Theodore was in shock and then Eleanor move the doors head to her breast And then Theodore start to suck on them after Theodore was done drinking all of it Eleanor then hoisted Theodore over her shoulder and then burped him what did Eleanor do next.

1321121121.content:
After his nursing, Theodore had to go to the bathroom. Feeling embarrassed in front of Eleanor, he asked "May I go potty?"

Eleanor reached down his diaper embarrassing him all the more. "You are still dry Baby Theo. I just gave you breast milk. I will happily change your didee."

Theodore replied "You won't tell anyone?"

Eleanor: "I keep secrets and promises
Theo. I pinkie promise you sweetie."
1321121121.title: Diapered him

choices: Theodore Agrees and Nothing Goes Wrong
Theodore Agrees, but Somebody Walks In
13211211211.content:
"I don't care! I can't use my diaper in front of you! I...I...waaaaah!" Theodore was panicking. He did not want his secret revealed to anybody. Although the baby treatment was fun and the milk good, he was still afraid.

Eleanor could tell that he liked having a "mommy" so she looked for something to calm him down. She saw a blanket and a pacifier and picked them up. "Here Theodore, take Blankie and Nukey and try to calm down for Mommy.

Theodore took his blankie and pacifier and he calmed down. He hugged his blanket and Eleanor put the pacifier in his mouth and he started to suckle. He calmed down, crossed his legs, and began to wet his diaper.

Theodore: "Hee Hee, pee pee Mommy." Said Baby Theo as he finished going potty.

Eleanor:"What a good boy you are Theodore! I am so happy to have my happy baby back!"

Theodore smiled under his pacifier and spread his legs out. He began to sake forward and back doing the "wet diaper dance." "Dibee vet dibee vet" sung theodore as he danced. It sounded like this because he couldn't bear to spit out Nukey, his favorite pacifier.

Eleanor: "Awww. How cute!" "Theodore, I am so happy that you are happy, but it's time for a didee change now."
13211211211.title: Wets

Dave comes in to clean up Thedore
133.content:
Theodore could always get away with things, Alvin never understood it but 60 percent of the time if Theodore messed up he didn't get in trouble. Like this morning, Alvin and Theodore woke up and you could clearly see his wet crotch, which meant the sheets were most likely wet. Alvin wasn't sure whether to laugh, or rat Theodore out for not wearing his daiper like Dave said. He started to do one or the other but Simon cut him off.
"Alvin please- it's Theodore." He said in a tone that hid a thousand lectures, either way it was wrong to laugh at Thedore or make him feel bad and Alvin knew this ad Thedore was taken by the hand to the bathroom, trying not to cry and suck his paw a bit.
133.title: He wasn't fully potty trained

How will the oldest sister of the Chipettes end up in diapers?

Note: Choice 3 is basically Brittany being forced into wearing diapers by her sisters or the other Chipmunks.

1412.content: How long has Brittany liked diapers?
1412.title: She Likes Them

14122.content: Brittany hasn't always like diapers, what started as a dare by her sisters to wear a diaper soon became something she does an a regular basis. Every once in a while she will wear them day and night and she hasn't committed to wearing them 24/7 but wears them regularly. Right now she is waking up in a Pampers diaper, but is it wet or dry right now?
14122.title: Not long

141221.content: As Brittany wakes up, she lifts up her night gown and saw her diaper was sagging and turned yellow. When she felt the diaper it was very warm and wet meaning she wet it not to long ago. Brittany wanted to enjoy the warmth of the diaper a little bit longer so she relaxed in bed and enjoyed the time. After a while her diaper soon became cold and uncomfortable something Brittany didn't like normally if she didn't want to change she would just wet it again to warn it up, but right now she didn't need to go and the diaper was close to leaking so she decided to was time to change. Did she change herself or did her sisters change her?
141221.title: Wet

1412211.content:
Brittany gets out of bed and makes her way to her closet. She gets out a diaper some baby wipes and powder, then she makes her way to her bed to start changing. She lays down on her bed and starts to untape her diaper, then she grabs some baby wipes and cleaned her diaper area and threw the wipes and diapers away. Then she grabbed a diaper put it under her, powered herself then taped the diaper on.

"Their all nice and clean" Brittany said feel happy being in a nice clean diaper. Now it was time for Brittany to get dressed for the day. Does she dress as a big girl or as a baby?
1412211.title: Change herself

choices: Brittany goes thorugh a process form hating them to liking them,
1413.content:
It was a crazy week at the household of The Chipettes, Brittany had been acting crazy lately and her sisters, Jeanette and Eleanor were wondering why.
Brittany had been getting into some outbursts, which is typical of Brittany, but the outbursts had turned into tanturms.
Her tantrums had been getting very wild and very much out of control, so out of control that Brittany had to be cut from her position as captain of the cheerleading squad at school.
Jeanette and Eleanor were worried about Brittany, so, when Brittany was not around, they got together to figure out how to resolve the situation.
"Maybe," Jeanette said to Eleanor "We need to take away her makeup again like we did last time she had a major outburst." "No," said Eleanor "We need to do something a little more 'extreme' to let her know that she can't keep having these outbursts."
"You're right!" squeaked Jeanette
"We need to think of something!" said Eleanor
Then there was a long, awkward silence....After that, Eleanor had an idea, so she told Jeanette what they would do and that they would carry out her idea tommorrow.

The next day, Jeanette and Eleanor were home, waiting for Brittany to come home, Brittany did not have any outbursts today, but Jeanette and Eleanor thought that they should do it today. They were going through a checklist, while Jeanette was looking out the window to watch for Brittany.
"Let's see here," said Eleanor "Pad on bed, check." "Restraints, to make sure she doesn't get away?" asked Jeanette "Check." replied Eleanor "Baby powder, so that Britt doesn't get 'Diaper Rash'?" asked Jeanette "Check," said Eleanor "Now we have her diapers, which happen to be Pampers size 8, alright Jeanette I'm ready when you are!"
"Good," said Jeanette "Because, here's Brittany!" So, Jeanette and Eleanor went down stairs, got Brittany and brought her upstairs, when Brittany asked what those things were doing on her bed, Jeanette and Ellie, layed her down on her bed, undressed her, put the restraints on her and Eleanor sprinkled the baby powder on her. Brittany resisted, but Eleanor said "Britt, either you let me put this diaper on you, because you've been acting like a baby or you can be spanked by Miss Miller!" So Brittany stopped resisting and let Eleanor put her diaper on.
For the next few weeks, Brittany had to wear diapers everywhere, all the time and because of that she was furious, but didn't want to get punished again. "Well," said Brittany "Looks like I'll have to cut them some slack and wear these diapers, also letting Ellie change them." she sighed and wondered what would happen next.
1413.title: Forced into them by the others

1432.content: So why are all 3 of the Chipette sisters diapered?
1432.title: All three of them.

choices: Baby clothes and things, and cribs, and diapers and pacifiers, their size.
14323.content: The chipettes arrived at Olivia's place to have a sleepover. Then when they enter her room, they all yelled "Olivia!" They hugged her as she holder them. Olivia said "Hey girls! It's great to have a sleepover with you!" She closed the door and locked it. Brittany said "Well, I can't wait to do this!" Then the girls got their stuff out. And Olivia got her things ready, food, drinks, music. And there was something else. The other package. Was it full of...
14323.title: Surprise from their friend, Olivia.

143231.content: The girls look over at the the things Olivia got out and noticed 2 packs of diapers, one that appeared to be for a girl Olivia's side and the other one appeared to be in the chipettes size. The girls were a little surprised to see the diapers, but didn't think it would be a bad thing if they wore diapers for the duration of the sleepover. Olivia was happy to hear the chipettee liked the idea of wearing diapers and started to get one out for herself and graved three much smaller diapers for the chupettes. Who got diapered first, Olivia or the chipettes?
143231.title: Just diapers, their size.

1432311.content: Olivia pulled off her pants and panties, and then she put some powder and baby oil on herself. Then she taped the diaper around her butt. Then she was done. She smiled as she felt the softness of the diaper.
1432311.title: Olivia

14323111.content: Olivia changed herself with ease and finally it was time for the chipettes to get diapered up. Olivia went over to the packages and gave them each a diaper of there color, some baby powder, and some baby oil and send them on there way to get themselves ready for the night. As the girls walk away from Olivia they discusses if they should help change each other, or if they should go different places in the room and change themselves. After some debating the girls decided to....
14323111.title: The chipettes get diapered now.

choices: They agree to play the game
They refuse to play the game
143232.content:
All three girls looked at each other with confusion. in the package were baby things just their size and every girls favorite color.

"Oh," said Olivia, "you girls were't supposed to see those yet, well since you did I thought of a great idea last night. How about we play a game of sorts where I'm a mom and you girls are my baby's. Isn't that a great idea!" the girls all looked at each other and silently agreed on a answer...
143232.title: Baby clothes and things, and cribs, and diapers...

choices: Olivia chose one of them randomly
1432321.content: While the girls did think this whole idea was a little weird, they had decided to just go along with it and try to have some fun. The girls looked back to Olivia and told her that they would play as her babies which made Olivia jump for joy as she began to get everything together to dress her new babies. As Olivia was gathering everything, the girls looked at each other once again and hoped that they made the right decision to make their friend happy. As they were talking Olivia finally got everything she needed to change the girls into babies and then told the girls that she was ready to help get them ready. Did one of the girls volunteer to be changed first, or did Olivia randomly choose someone?
1432321.title: They agree to play the game

choices: The floor drops and the girls fall in a baby machine
1432322.content:
Brittney stepped forward and said, "Umm... sorry Olivia, but we aren't comfortable playing that kind of game."

"Oh...ok then...you girls can go into my bathroom and change into you pajamas..." Olivia said in defeat. The girls then walked into the bathroom and closed the door behind them.

Eleanor than broke the silence by saying, "wow, she seemed disappointed."

"Yeah," replied Jenelle, "She looked like she really wanted to do that."

"Well, we said no, and she wouldn't force us to do it." said Brittney. They all then entered their personal changing rooms. Olivia made them for the girls since they sleep over a lot. But just after they got into their rooms suddenly...
1432322.title: They refuse to play the game

info.brief_description: What if the Chipmunks were in diapers again, you can use the Chipettes if you wish!
info.description:
Ever wondered what happened if Alvin or his brothers were in diapers, or even the Chipettes, it's all up to you.
Disclaimer: I do not own Alvin and the Chipmunks or the related characters, these are owned by Ross Bagdasarian Jr and Bagdasarian Studios.
info.pretty_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks Diaper Story
